title: game crashes before loading screen. pls help
body: So i go into champion select pick my jungler and the game starts. it goes to the screen where everyone loads but mine was black. Eventually kept coming to "Unable to connect to the server. Please check ur network connection and attempt to reconnect ur game." I have tried and tried the reconnect button, again no progress i have restarted my pc and lol many times, again no progress and i have checked internet and it is fine. idk what is happening but i cri evry tiem and pls halp

replies.body: Do you also use iPrimus? I have a thread just below this one where we're experiencing the same issue. We all have one thing in common. iPrimus. Trouble started today.

Hi guys,

There was an issue earlier tonight with one of the providers that many ISPs use to reach the League game servers (IX Australia), which happened earlier tonight - [thread here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/FErIFkEZ-march-31st-2016-server-issue).  As fallout from this issue it looks like some players are having lingering problems with their connections despite the root cause being fixed.

I'd expect that as your ISPs reconfigure their routing following the fix, this should resolve itself but not all have done so at this point.

Cheers
Mindstar

That's even worse HAHA

so maybe there is a server side issue.
But just doing a search online and DoDo is now owned by iPrimus... so chances are they use the same network, protocols, etc. Looks like it might be provider specific
